titleStmt.title: Great Britains glory, or, A brief description of the present state, splendor, and magnificence of the Royal Exchange with some remarkable passages relating to the present engagement : humbly presented to the several merchants of the City of London, who daily meet, traffique, and converse in the said place / by Theophilus Philalethes.
titleStmt.author: T. P. (Theophilus Philalethes)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Ratcliffe, and Nat. Thompson, for Jonathan Edwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
